Settings.Name: Difficulty
Settings.Tooltip: Select the Hit Point scaling curve for normal NPCs.
Settings.Description:
Hit Point Scaling:
Easy: (Level*6-6) + (Level*CON*2) + 2d4
Normal: (Level*12-12) + (Level*CON*3) + 3d6
Hard: (Level*18-18) + (Level*CON*4) + 4d8
Very Hard: (Level*24-24) + (Level*CON*5) + 5d10
Nightmare: (Level*30-30) + (Level*CON*6) + 6d12

Settings.Name: Difficulty
Settings.Tooltip: Select the Hit Point scaling curve for Dangerous NPCs.
Settings.Description:
Hit Point Scaling:
Easy: (Level*12-12) + (Level*CON*4) + 4d4
Normal: (Level*24-24) + (Level*CON*5) + 6d6
Hard: (Level*36-36) + (Level*CON*6) + 8d8
Very Hard: (Level*48-48) + (Level*CON*7) + 10d10
Nightmare: (Level*60-60) + (Level*CON*8) + 12d12

Settings.Name: Difficulty
Settings.Tooltip: Select the Hit Point scaling curve for Fatal NPCs.
Settings.Description:
Hit Point Scaling:
Easy: (Level*24-24) + (Level*CON*8) + 8d4
Normal: (Level*48-48) + (Level*CON*9) + 12d6
Hard: (Level*72-72) + (Level*CON*10) + 16d8
Very Hard: (Level*96-96) + (Level*CON*11) + 20d10
Nightmare: (Level*120-120) + (Level*CON*12) + 24d12
